subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency called cycling’s world governing body, known as the U.C.I., deceitful for shutting down its independent doping panel.
snippet: The World Anti-Doping Agency called cycling’s world governing body, known as the U.C.I., deceitful for shutting down its independent doping panel.
